correspondence.message: I previously earned credits for the course 'Concepts of C++ Programming IN2377,' assigned to the free elective area. For the 24/25 winter semester, this course will be under the Databases and Information Systems (DBI) area. Can you confirm if my credits can be reallocated to the DBI area? If not, can I retake the course for DBI credit?"

Please contact the secretary of the examination board responsible for your program for assistance regarding this matter. Their contact information can be found here: cit.tum.de/en/cit/contact-studies-informatics/
